subdisciplines.name: Behavioral Ecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the ecological and evolutionary basis for animal behavior, often focusing on the behavior of individuals within populations.

subdisciplines.name: Conservation Biology
subdisciplines.description: The study of the preservation of biodiversity and the management of ecosystems to prevent their loss.

subdisciplines.name: Population Ecology
subdisciplines.description: The study of how populations of organisms interact with their environment and with each other.
